content: Give me a list of 22 words that have 'ous' somewhere in them.

Certainly! Here's a list of 22 words that contain "ous" somewhere in them:

1. Dangerous
2. Courageous
3. Curious
4. Gracious
5. Mysterious
6. Ambitious
7. Joyous
8. Famous
9. Glorious
10. Hazardous
11. Continuous
12. Precious
13. Various
14. Furious
15. Spacious
16. Obnoxious
17. Serious
18. Venturesome
19. Ambivalent
20. Exuberant
21. Inevitable
22. Eloquent

I hope this list helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
